fi.aalto.skillserver

Class SkillServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.aalto.skillserver.SkillServer

  • public class SkillServer
extends java.lang.Object
    AFOF Skill Server OPC UA server providing the OPC UA part of the Skill Model. Acts as a bridge between the Skill Model implementation in NXT and the OPC UA representation. Based on the Prosys OPC UA SDK for Java and provided examples. Copyright 2020 Aalto University
